summary: Implements the Ansible copy action plugin, orchestrating the process of transferring files or inline content to remote hosts. It prepares arguments for the underlying remote copy/file modules, creates temporary files when needed, handles directory recursion, validates execution context, computes checksums, and ensures cleanup of temporary resources after execution.
business_intent: Automate reliable and idempotent distribution of files and directories to target machines within Ansible playbooks, supporting both source paths and inline content, while handling errors and preserving system integrity.
